name: Live Abstract Painting, Contact Mic, and Virtual Modular Synth
description: Live painting on white paper and attached (hidden) contact microphone at the bottom to get vibrations of knife for mix acrylic colors that use for painting based on free improvisation. Capture by a contact mic as an audio input, then process it to virtual modular system for trigger sounds of resonator module, and connect to granular audio processor for add sound textures. Performed and concept by Fahmi Mursyid. Check other artworks : behance.net/fahmimursyid
